titles.title: I've Been Redeemed, By The Blood Of The Lamb

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I've been redeeemed by the blood of the Lamb (x3)
Filled with the Holy Ghost I am,
All my sins are washed away, I've been redeemed.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And that's not all, there's more besides: (x3)
I've been to the river and I've been baptised,
All my sins are washed away, I've been redeemed.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Now Satan's mad, and I am glad, (x3)
He's lost a soul that he thought he'd had,
All my sins are washed away, I've been redeemed.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
You can talk about me, just as much as you please, (3x)
I'll talk about you down on my knees,
All my sins are washed away, I've been redeemed.

verse.name: v5
